issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The JVM can crash upon exit with a SIGSEGV when leveldb is configured with a custom user logger as is done with LeveldbLogger.  See https://github.com/fusesource/leveldbjni/issues/36 for details.
fields.summary: JVM can crash with SIGSEGV when exiting due to custom leveldb logger

comments.body: As a workaround we can remove the use of custom user logger for leveldb.
Patch that removes the use of a custom logger from leveldb instances that were using one.
